raw: 5 cups (1.2 L) homemade beef or chicken stock or store-bought low-sodium chicken broth (if using store-bought broth, pour 1 packet unflavored gelatin (2 1/2 teaspoons; 10 g) over it and let set for 5 minutes; see notes)

parse_ingredients.item: homemade beef or chicken stock or store-bought low-sodium chicken broth over it and let set for 5 minutes; see notes)

enrich_metric_weights.item: homemade beef or chicken stock or store-bought low-sodium chicken broth over it and let set for 5 minutes; see notes)
